creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: People waiting in line for the warm lunch provided by World Centlal Kithcen humanitarian organization in Lyman, Donetsk region. Every day, locals gather here to receive free portion of soup, main and warm drink. The city was occupied by Russians and liberated by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in October 2022. The humanitarian situation remains difficult, as remaining residents have no access to gas and water, and limited access to electricity. The city was severely damaged during fighting, majority of buildings were destroyed. These days, Russian army continue shelling Lyman, killing civillians and destroing more houses almost daily.
